description: Fill the house with the aromas of flavourful chickpea stew. Topped with pesto and parmesan the whole family will love this hearty slow cooker recipe.
name: Tomato & Chickpea Stew With Basil Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g ciced Italian tomatoes no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, celery and carrot for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until vegetables start to soften. Add garlic, fennel and paste, then cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant. Transfer mixture to the bowl of a 5.5-litre slow cooker (see Tip).
Add tomatoes, chickpeas and stock, cover with lid and cook on high for 4 hours or until vegetables are tender. Season.
Top stew with pesto and parmesan, and serve with bread.
